signup.subtitle: A diary app with AI agent

onboarding.title: Hi deary
onboarding.subtitle:
This is a text-free social diary app.
Before we begin, let’s finish the setup.

onboarding_permission.title: Check permissions
onboarding_permission.subtitle:
For the best app experience,
we'll need access to your personal data.

description.location: To automatically create a map or timeline of places you visited today in your diary, this app collects location data in the background.
description.storage: To create diary entries using your photos, this app needs access to your photo library.
description.notification: To remind you to write your diary and show notification while tracing your location, this app needs permission to send notifications.

dialog.regenerate_title: Are you sure you want to regenerate diary?

dialog.sign_out_title: Are you sure you want to sign out?
dialog.delete_account_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
dialog.delete_account_content: This action is irreversible. All your data will be deleted.
